name: fullstackopen-phonebook-backend
description: Node backend for the phonebook application

scripts.build:ui: rm -rf dist && cd ../fullstackopen/part2/phonebook && npm run build && cp -r dist/ ../../../fullstackopen-phonebook-backend/
scripts.build:full: npm run build:ui && git add . && git commit -m uibuild && git push

author: Ilkka Tommola <ilta@iki.fi>
